sentences.english: A wavelet-based electrocardiogram data semi-lossless compression algorithm was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于小波变换的心电信号准无损压缩算法。

sentences.english: An asynchronous electrical signal from a peripheral to the processor.
sentences.chinese: 一个从外设到处理器的异步电信号。

sentences.english: It is a network that adjusts the spec-trutn of electron signals.
sentences.chinese: 它是一种对电信号的频谱进行修整的网络。

sentences.english: Results Experimental curver of contractile force vs electromyographic signals were obtained. Conclusi…
sentences.chinese: 结果得到了收缩力与各种肌电信号的实验关系曲线。

sentences.english: Surface myoelectric signal analysis has been proved effective for assessing the electrical manifestations of localized muscle fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 表面肌电信号分析是评价局部肌肉疲劳有效的工具。

sentences.english: The punched holes translated to electrical signals.
The laser interferometer is like a microphone that converts gravitational waves into electrical signals.
sentences.chinese: 激光反射器就像一个转换器将引力波转换成电信号。

sentences.english: It worked by transmitting electrical signals over a wire laid between stations.
sentences.chinese: 它通过铺设在电报站之间的电线传送电信号工作。

sentences.english: The objective of this study is to control humanoid robot in real-time by using EMGs.
sentences.chinese: 研究的目标是利用肌电信号实时控制仿生手的运动。

sentences.english: Surface myoelectric signal analysis has proved effective for assessing the electrical manifestations of localized muscle fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 表面肌电信号分析是评价局部肌肉疲劳有效的工具。

sentences.english: Optocoupler to transmit light signals for the media.
sentences.chinese: 光耦合器以光为媒介传输电信号。

sentences.english: The FECS were extracted using adaptive interference cancellation technique.
sentences.chinese: 用自适应干扰对消技术提取胎儿心电信号。

sentences.english: To reduce these disadvanteages, the EMG signal is pre-disposed by wavelet de- noising theory.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法很适合处理非特定人的肌电信号。

sentences.english: Your SA node sends out the electrical signal that guides the rest of the heart tissue.
sentences.chinese: 你的窦房结发出的电信号会指导心脏的其他组织。

sentences.english: Noise reduction is first applied as the full-frame sensor converts light to electronic signals.
sentences.chinese: 降噪是首次应用于的全画幅传感器光转换为电信号。

sentences.english: A loudspeaker (or "speaker") is an electroacoustic transducer that converts an electrical signal into sound.
sentences.chinese: 扬声器是一种把电信号转变为声信号的换能器件。
